1.content:
Here you can select the person you will be playing as.


Male Character:
Alexander is an 18 year old Caucasian boy with brown hair and blue eyes. He is nice but doesn’t go out much. He loves movies (mostly horror) and is very athletic.


Female Character:
Lilith is an 18 year old Caucasian girl with a very pale skin, black hair and green eyes. She can be nice or mean depending on her mood. She loves video games and goes for a run every evening to stay in shape.

3 More character can be requested

There you go pick your character and start.
Have fun!
1.title: So Who Are You?

Lana: Alexander's 16 year old sister. She has red hair just like her mother and the same blue eyes as the rest of the family. She is short for her age and can be mean sometimes.

“What the hell is going on?” He thinks to himself.
The living room door opens and he sees his giant…

1111.content:
Lana walks in. She had taken her shoes off at the front door like always and is now walking towards her tiny brother with her white socks on. Alex is paralyzed as he sees his sister’s steps coming closer and closer. Her foot lands right in front of him.
“Wow, that was close.” He says and looks up while his sister walks over him. She sits down in the sofa and starts watching television.
What does Alex do?
1111.title: Lana Is Home.

11111.content:
While Lana watches TV Alexander decides to run towards her feet. He thinks if he can tickle them she might notice him. Alex is in luck, her feet are on the floor and not on the table or in the sofa. It might be difficult to tickle them because she’s still wearing her socks. When Alex looks up he sees his sister staring at the TV screen like a zombie. She always spends hours watching series on Netflix.

When Alex finally reaches her feet he tries to tickle the sensitive spots. Lana notices a small itch on her and starts scratching her one foot with the other. Alexander jumps off just in time. He thinks about it, maybe if he bites her she will look down to see what bit her. Alex starts climbing his sister’s sock until her reaches bare skin. He bites down and as soon as he hears his sister yell he jumps off again. He hits the ground quite hard but isn’t injured. Like planned his sister looks down to see the insect that bit her. To her surprise she sees what look like a very small human… her brother???

“Alex? Is that you?” Lana asks.
The boy yelled at the top of his lungs. “Yes! I was afraid you wouldn’t notice me.”
His sister reaches down and picks him up.
“How did you get so small?”
“I don’t know.” He responds
“It’s going to be ok big brother.” She says smiling.
Alexander’s heart starts pounding. he is glad she found him, but isn’t sure if that is a good thing.

She pauses the TV and says. “I'm going to …”

11131.content:
As the TV blared on in the background, Alexander felt disturbed. On the one hand, he was making good progress towards the front door. . but what would he do when he got there? He was so incredibly tiny that even if he was able to escape going outside. . what then? With all the bugs, animals, and other natural occurrences, he'd be destroyed for sure. He needed some kind of plan. The tiny boy stopped a bit midway through the living room. Alex looked at the base of a table beside the couch that his mother was sitting at. His biggest concern was that if his mother saw him, she would think he was a bug instead of a person. . .

Still. . .

Perhaps if he were to somehow get her attention. Then, he might be able to survive all of this mess. His mom would take him to a doctor or something. . then he'd be safe. It might be his only hope. A large shadow interrupted his thoughts, blotting out all of the light.

WHAAM!!!

Alex couldn't see! Something. . fabric-y had covered his entire body. Screaming in fear, he swam upwards, trying to break free of this sudden attack on his person. What was this? Where had it come from? As he made his way up towards the opening, he realized what he was "swimming" in. Looking up, he saw the titaness of his mother standing up. Only she was no longer wearing a shirt of any kind! He had no idea that his mom liked to walk around without any shirt on! Below, he noticed her pants, lying slothfully on the ground, his mom's black panties struggling to hold her large ass from popping out of her clothes.

Her large glutinous breasts swayed back and forth, rocking like two heavy pillows as she got up, a bit frustrated having to leave the comfort of her chair. Janet was enjoying lying down, but her restless stomach kept this idea from coming into fruition. Janet put her hand on her pudgy stomach, a sigh leaving her mouth. She really needed to consider working out again. She just gets so tired after the long days of work.

Meanwhile, Alex couldn't help but stared at the naked giant slowly timbering away. He was still trapped in the shirt she had been wearing earlier that she tossed across the room. Moving forward, the tiny boy decided to roll out of this shirt, lest he get. .

BOOM!

The first step was so fast, Alex wasn't ready for it! He fell backwards, back into the opening of the shirt! He was trapped back in, again! Moving upward fast, he had to get out of this shirt. His mom was coming right at him. He knew from watching his mom before that most of the time she just stomped right down on top of her clothes. . and with him inside. . she would crush him easily!! Quickly, he made his way back to. .

BOOM!!

Again, Alex was thrust back, the vibrations were too much for the little one!

BOOM!!

Each step shook the ground and Alex realized that his giantess mom was coming right in his direction! He was still trapped and didn't know what to do at this point.

BOOOOM!!

BOOOOOM!!!!

The steps were getting louder as the giantess was getting closer and closer.

12131.content:
You smile to yourself as you drive down the road towards your friend Miranda's house. It's been years since you've spent the night over at her house. Everyone agreed that it seemed a bit childish to still have sleepovers. But since you guys plan on spending the entire long weekend together to binge watch movies on the couch, Miranda's house was chosen to spend the next three days in.

With labor day on Monday, you get to miss school and hang out for the entire day. To top it off, Miranda's parents were going on vacation for the weekend so it's looking up to be an epic weekend.

Pulling into the driveway of the two-story house you feel excited to see Jen and Liz's cars ahead of you. They were on the fence about coming so you're glad they showed up. You grab your backpack and head for the door.

As soon as you reach for the doorbell, the door flew open and you were squished against two large, soft orbs.

"Gah! Let go of me, Titan-Tits!" you jokingly say while pushing against your taller friend. After a back breaking squeeze, Miranda finally let's go of you. Miranda was best described as an amazon. She was tall, slender and strong. Her body was tight with lean muscle, but still managed to have killer curves. Her smiling face was complimented with long, curly blonde hair and green eyes. Personality-wise she was definitely dominant. Some of her bad habits included picking people up of pulling them where she wanted them to go.

"Oh you know you love them! C'mon, the others are waiting for you. We're about to start Lord of the Rings/The Hobbit marathon. Back to back will last about 22 hours, so you better be ready!"

Coming inside you notice Jen already snacking while laying on the floor while Liz was practically asleep while taking up the whole couch. Jennifer was a pudgy brunette with a pretty face and long hair. Her breasts and butt were huge, but they didn't seem that large due to her chubby tummy. She was wearing nothing but pink panties and a white tank top that was way too small, revealing an impressive amount of skin. Ever since you've known her, she's been a flirt. It didn't matter who it was, she's gone out with boys and girls alike. Every time she tries it with you someone else has to save you or else she'd never stop. Her blue eyes didn't even lift off the bowl of chips she was digging into.

Liz on the other hand was a skinny asian girl. Her slim figure was considered cute by most boys around school and has had many boyfriends, but is currently single. Her short black hair was tied back in a pony tail and her brown eyes locked onto you as Miranda lead you inside. She was wearing a matching set of long purple pajamas with cats printed all over them. While she was a great friend, she was pretty conceited.

"Hey girls, look who popped up! We can finally start!"

"Finally! By the way, we need more dip..." said Jen.

"It's about time! Since your the last one, looks like you get the honor of being my footrest" said Liz. Before you could ask what she meant, Jen and Miranda hopped onto the three-person couch. Part of the couch stretched out so someone could either lay down or allow other people to sit. Liz was currently laying down all the way, taking every last inch.

With a smile on her face, she continued. "Or you could sit on the floor. But if ye want the comfort of the couch, ye must rub my feet for every minute" she joked.

"Hardy har-har" you snap back. "You guys put on the first movie, I'll go get in my pajamas and grab more snacks"

"Thanks Babe" Jen smirks.

Heading down the hallway towards the kitchen, your head begins to spin and everything starts to black out...

When your eyes re-open, everything is different. The ceiling seems to be miles away and everything is huge. YOU'VE SHRUNK!

Everything seems scary at this size, but then you hear the thundering footsteps.

"Jeez, can't she even get dip" you hear as _____ come down the hallway straight towards you!

You head up the stairs to your room, when the front door opened, and in stepped your older sister, Rachel, who is 20, and your younger sister, Carly, who is 13, Carly was looking depressed.

"H-hi Lilith." She says, sniffing. You run down the stairs and ask what was wrong. Carly was attempting to speak, but couldn't. "Rachel?" "She got bullied by these kids at her school, 'said she was weak and ugly."

"Really Carly?" You ask. She nods. "Well, let's go to my room and talk about it." She nods again, and follows you, "And Rachel? You do... Whatever it is you do." You head to your room, set down your stuff on your desk, and sit down on the bed with Carly.

Lilith shuffled down the stairs, scrolling through her phone contacts. Maybe one of her sciencey friends at Uni would know. Bring the friend over, do a whole lot of science... yeah, that seemed like it'd check out. It was better than just flailing aimlessly anyway. At least this was some sort of a lead.

Lilith looked the kid up and down. Jeans, baggy t-shirt, oversized glasses, more freckles than face... yeah, it checked out. She looked about Carly's age.

12233.content:
Lilith is sitting on the park bench when she sees an extremely hot couple walking on by. Being bisexual, she takes an interest in both of them. The couple is white, in their mid twenties, and they both have well defined, healthily looking, model type bodies. The blue-eyed man stands 6’2, and he has a short, well-groomed, light-brown hair, with no facial hair or chest hair. He is wearing jeans, along with a nice t-shirt, and he is well hung with a nice ass. The emerald-eyed woman stands 5’10, she has long strawberry blonde hair, and she too is wearing blue jeans and a white tank top. She has large, perky, natural breasts, with a slender body and curvy hips. She also has a fantastic ass. “I bet they could be in porn if they wanted too,” Lilith thinks to herself as she licks her lips.

Lilith also sees a hot mother and her attractive young son walking around. Lilith is extremely kinky, and cruel. She wonders if they have ever entered into a taboo relationship, probably not, or even better, could be forced into one. The blue-eyed mom is white, around 32-years-old, stands 5’7, and has medium length golden blonde hair. She has large, perky, natural breasts, a lean, well-defined body, with curvy hips and a lovely ass. Her biological son is white, stands 5’5, and is 13-years-old. He has short, golden blonde hair, blue eyes, and he is well hung for his age, with a nice ass. He has a baby face, and no facial, or chest hair. The boy is dressed in shorts, and a t-shirt. His mom is dressed in jeans, and a white t-shirt.

As the hot mother and son, along with the gorgeous couple turn the corner, and are hidden from everyone else's view, Lilith feels a surge of sexual pleasure. She also hears tiny screams. Alarmed, she stands up, turns the corner, and is astonished to see on the ground before her?
12233.title: Lilith is at the park and shrinks people.

info.brief_description: Play as Alexander or Lilith and decide where the story goes.
info.description:
Introduction by the creator
Hi my name is Tommy. You might know me, you might not. I have created this new shrinking story to add to the big pile we already have. Hoping that I can call it âBest Giantess / Shrinking Interactiveâ one day. And I was thinking you could help me with that.


Information about the story
The story takes place in a modern day setting. Your character is 18 years old and your first choice will be whether youâre boy or a girl. As a boy you will shrink, as a girl you will get the choice to be shrunken or shrink others. The reason for this is because I would like to keep male giants out of the story. (I can set up a different story for those if you really want me to - pm me)


Important Rules:
- No Male giants!
- Make death avoidable! (Unlike others I highly support death chapters, but always make sure the story doesnât run into a dead end.)
- At least 2 choices in every chapter! (Unless itâs an ending)

(Chapters breaking these rules will be deleted!)


Less Important Rules:
- Keep the toilet content to a minimum.
- I don't mind short chapters.
- Please give a fun title to the chapter you add.
- No âReaderâs Choiceâ â¦ Please Itâs like a blindfold.
- Donât go too far with children and keep the minimum age around 13.
- Donât do weird, random, nothing to do with the subject stuffâ¦
- Write in present time.
- Please don't make shrunken people taller than 3 Inches.

(These are guidelines, if you donât follow these your chapters might be edited.)


Don't forget to rate & favorite! :)
